entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLDER WITH LOWS AROUND 6 BELOW
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH THIS EVENING

SUNNY, COLD WITH HIGHS AROUND 15
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 13 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 3 ABOVE
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 6 BELOW

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS AROUND 30
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 2 BELOW
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
LOWS AROUND ZERO

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 20
LOWS ZERO TO 5 ABOVE ZERO

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND ZERO
HIGHS AROUND 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
